title: Aarstiderne Campaign
description: Designed the campaign website and campaign material for Aarstiderne affiliate campaign at Adservice.
challenge: Adservice is an affiliate company that connects advertisers and publishers. Aarstiderne was one of our advertisers which wanted to generate more leads through our gamification concept "LeadPlatform".
solution: A campaign website and campaign material were designed resulting in 10.000+ visitiors and and a 17%+ conversion rate.
